Anwar Al-Aug (Arabic: انور العوج; born 5 February 1986) is a Yemeni football goalkeeper who is currently playing for Al-Ittihad Ibb.
Honours
Country
*Yemen U17
**FIFA U-17 World Cup
***Group Stage: 2003
** AFC U-17 Championship
***Runner-up: 2002 AFC U-17 Championship
